title: how to speed up or fix this issue
body: i m not a nerd but i format my pc after that i installing that the downloading speed goes max to 200kbps wtf is this ,i did it before but there is always i get near 1mbps but now its not even 500 kbps wtf guys  i love this game but this is pissed me off improve your f server

replies.body:
It can take some time to patch, but note that the speeds during patching can vary depending on which part of patching you're at and how many files it needs to grab.

Let me know if you have any further questions.
